Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh for versions less than 0.10.6-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-48795 affecting package libssh for versions less than 0.10.6-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package libssh is earlier than 0.10.6-1, affected by CVE-2023-48795
